page.title: 07The Village Stores.
page.content:
The owners of the village stores live just above it. Apart from selling {groceries}they sell many other things, for instance,{toys, wines, spirits, {stationery, paint brushes}and so on.
Before the shop was built there was a small wooden hut actually on the premises where the store is now. The shop was built in{l948.
The{warehouse}they go to is R.A. Instones of Shrewsbury, and they go there every Wednesday to get the packages of food etc.
The{times of opening}are eight o' clock till one, and two o'clock till half past five every day except on Thursday afternoon and Sunday.
